page.title: 20Bromley Y
page.content: Since the mid sixties, Bromley Y has provided a variety of support services for young people.This year, 500 people between 15 and 25 years have visited the centre for general advice and professional counselling. The aims of Bromley Y are to - 1.Provide a service which complements those offered by the statutory bodies 2.Help young people with their problems through professional counselling 3.Extend their social skills and confidence through the medium of small groups 4.To provide bed-sitting room accommodation.Bromley Y is an independant charity and employs professianally qualified staff and trains voluntary workers to run small evening groups.***********************. {Schools in group}:Babington House, Bickley Park,Burnt Ash Junior,Highfield Infant/Junior,Stratford House.
